attributes.action: Ban Elvis Presly impersonators in competitions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is disrespectful to impersonate the king of rock and roll with such shallow talent. The sterotypical outfit used by these impersonators is not relevant to how he dressed throughout his career.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
